sqls.sql: SELECT inbox.id, inbox.subject, inbox.message_type, inbox.ref_no, inbox.service, inbox.created_dt FROM INTER_INBOX AS inbox WHERE 1=1 <#if index_id??> AND CHARINDEX(:index_id, inbox.id) >0</#if> <#if message_type??> AND inbox.message_type = :message_type</#if> <#if service??> AND inbox.service = :service</#if>
